recipe.title: Deviled Drumsticks
ingredients: 2 tablespoons finely chopped green onion tops
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F. Spray small baking sheet with vegetable oil spray. Whisk mayonnaise, mustard and Worcestershire sauce in medium bowl to blend. Whisk breadcrumbs and green onions in another medium bowl to blend. Dip 1 chicken drumstick in mayonnaise mixture; turn to coat. Place drumstick in crumb mixture; turn to coat. Transfer to prepared baking sheet. Repeat with remaining drumsticks. Bake chicken until cooked through, about 25 minutes.
